comments.body:
Instead of declaring this as ambient module here please add zdog as another package and move definitions there. 
Thank you.
If `zdog` package already present you just need to reference it instead of redefining it

please take a look at https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#im-writing-a-definition-that-depends-on-another-definition-should-i-use-reference-types--or-an-import 
If something is missing or wrong in https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/zdog/index.d.ts you can fix it instead and please remove the definition of zdog from here.

@sheetalkamat [`zdog`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/zdog) & [`zfont`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/zfont) are different packages. `@types/zdog` is implemented correctly.

`zfont` patch the `zdog` API.
Got it .. I didn't realise that it was augmentation instead of definition. Thanks
